author: rappoccio
body:
#### PR description:

Urgent fix required for Issue #35805

#### PR validation:


Ran workflow that is reported to fail in the issue above: 

```
cmsrel CMSSW_12_0_3
cd CMSSW_12_0_3/src
cmsenv
git cms-merge-topic rappoccio:promptreco_bug_35805
cp /eos/cms/store/logs/prod/recent/PromptReco/PromptReco_Run345920_MinimumBias/Reco/vocms0314.cern.ch-129943-3-log.tar.gz .
tar -xzvf vocms0314.cern.ch-129943-3-log.tar.gz
cd job/WMTaskSpace/cmsRun1/
cmsRun PSet.py
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #35809
title: Workaround / fix for Issue #35805, add default for splashSwitch in ECAL timing monitor
